headline: Sherwin-Williams to Buy BASF's Suvinil in an All-Cash Transaction
summary: The buyout will allow SHW to accelerate profitable above-market growth by providing industry-leading solutions.

headline: Sherwin-Williams to buy BASF Brazilian architectural paints business for $1.15B
summary: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) announced it has entered into a definitive agreement with BASF Group (BASFY) to acquire BASF’s Brazilian architectural paints business, “Suvinil,” for $1.15B in an all-cash transaction. Sherwin-Williams intends to finance the transaction through a combination of cash on hand, liquidity available under existing facilities and new debt. The purchase price represents a low teens EBITDA multiple following anticipated post transaction synergies net of one-time costs. The transa
